languages.text: "Какая прекрасная утренняя служба в дворцовом храме! Удивительно, как раньше я умудрялся засыпать на них..."

traits.locale_text: "Какая прекрасная утренняя служба в дворцовом храме! Удивительно, как раньше я умудрялся засыпать на них..."

languages.text: "The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."
languages.original_text: "Какая прекрасная утренняя служба в дворцовом храме! Удивительно, как раньше я умудрялся засыпать на них..."

traits.locale_text: "What a brilliant morning service in the palace church! I wonder how I used to be falling asleep during them..."
"What a brilliant morning service in the palace church! I wonder how I used to be falling asleep during them..."
"What a brilliant morning service in the palace church! I wonder how I used to fall asleep during them..."
"What a brilliant morning service in the palace church! I wonder how I used to fall asleep during them..."
"The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."

languages.text: “宫殿教堂的晨祷真是太精彩了！我真不敢相信，我以前每次做弥撒的时候居然会睡着……”
languages.original_text: "The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."

traits.locale_text: “宫殿教堂的晨祷真是太精彩了！我真不敢相信，我以前每次做弥撒的时候居然会睡着……”

languages.text: « L'office célébré ce matin au temple du palais était tout bonnement merveilleux ! J'ai peine à croire qu'hier encore, les sermons avaient le don de m'endormir... »
languages.original_text: "The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."

traits.locale_text: « L'office célébré ce matin au temple du palais était tout bonnement merveilleux ! J'ai peine à croire qu'hier encore, les sermons avaient le don de m'endormir... »

languages.text: 「宮廷寺院での朝の礼拝は本当に素晴らしかった！今となっては、以前は説教中に寝ていたとは信じられない…」
languages.original_text: "The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."

traits.locale_text: 「宮廷寺院での朝の礼拝は本当に素晴らしかった！今となっては、以前は説教中に寝ていたとは信じられない…」

languages.text: «¡Los servicios de esta mañana en el templo de palacio han sido maravillosos! No sé cómo me dormía antes con los sermones...».
languages.original_text: "The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Los servicios de esta mañana en el templo de palacio han sido maravillosos! No sé cómo me dormía antes con los sermones...».

languages.text: "Der morgendliche Gottesdienst im Palasttempel war schlicht wunderbar! Ich kann kaum glauben, dass ich früher bei den Predigten immer eingeschlafen bin ..."
languages.original_text: "The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."

traits.locale_text: "Der morgendliche Gottesdienst im Palasttempel war schlicht wunderbar! Ich kann kaum glauben, dass ich früher bei den Predigten immer eingeschlafen bin ..."

languages.text: "Saraydaki tapınaktaki sabah ayini, tek kelimeyle mükemmeldi! Eskiden vaazların uykumu getirdiğine inanmakta güçlük çekiyorum..."
languages.original_text: "The morning service at the palace temple was simply marvellous! Now I can scarcely believe that sermons used to put me to sleep..."
